long_description: Made of a blend of stretch fabric and sturdy polyester/cotton infused with Greenland wax, the women's classic Nikka Trousers from Fjallraven are tough and technical for trekking and backpacking. Made primarily of Fjallraven G-1000 fabric infused with Greenland wax (beeswax and paraffin) for wind and water resistance; fabric also resists mosquitoes. Stretch fabric in the lower back; G-1000 reinforcements at the rear, knees and leg openings. Rear and knees are pre-shaped to enhance mobility and comfort. Rise is higher in the back to fit comfortably when wearing a backpack. Extra piece of fabric in the crotch and the placement of the inseams reduce the risk of rubbing. Zippered hand pockets are placed for easy access even when wearing a hip belt. Right leg has a large pocket with flap and smaller mesh inner pocket; left leg has a small pocket for a mobile phone or GPS. The women's Fjallraven Nikka Trousers have an inseam of 33 in.
short_description: Made of a blend of stretch fabric and sturdy polyester/cotton infused with Greenland wax, the women's classic Nikka Trousers from Fjallraven are tough and technical for trekking and backpacking.
